text: Han Sang-jin (born January 17, 1978) is a South Korean actor. He is best known for starring in television dramas such as Behind the White Tower (2007), Yi San (2007), My Too Perfect Sons (2009), Marry Me, Please (2010), and The King's Doctor (2012). ==Filmography== ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable" style="width:600px" |- ! width=10|Year !
